sentences: Francesco Buzzurro (born October 7, 1969, in Taormina, Italy) is an Italian guitarist.
He earned a diploma from the Bellini Conservatory in Palermo, and later obtained a Master of Advanced Music from the International Arts Academy in Rome.
2010: Received a prize from Italian President Giorgio Napolitano for the music in the docufilm Io ricordo
Groove Master Award prize a Francesco Buzzurro, perché "nell'ambito del groove e del contemporary jazz è riuscito ad offrire una nuova visione musicale, completata da una tecnica unica al mondo".
